attributes.action: CANCEL David Cameron Resignation & Start 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should be another referendum
attributes.background: Mr Cameron is the youngest and one of the best leader & prime minister in the last 200 years of British Politics history, and due to his Honesty, Hard work and extra ordinary contribution towards the country we don't want him to Resign!

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.

If you would like to call for a second referendum on Britain's EU membership, you can do so here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/147061

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215
